casebody.data:
Fred H. Elliott v. City of Roanoke. September 5, 1940. Record No. 2286.

Present, Campbell, C. J., and Holt, Hudgins, Browning, Eggleston and Spratley, JJ.

Earl A. Fitzpatrick and T. W. Messick, for the plaintiff in error. R. S. Smith and R. T. Edwards, for the defendant in error.

Staunton
